attributes.action: restart bringing bottles to the supermarket and getting money back for your unwanted bottles!start more people recycling!
attributes.additional_details: at school in science we've been studying recycling and how we can change our carbon foot print by getting more people recycling!i thought we should restart getting money back at our local supermarkets by giving in our unwanted bottles , we think this will make people do more recycling!we need to change our planet for the better and for a brighter future! If you already hand in your bottles even better if you can get cash back!
